name: golden_03_flying_bird
prompt: create a flying blue bird that floats around

verify.code: () => { const entities = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.entities; const bird = entities.find(e => e.constructor.name.toLowerCase().includes('bird')); return bird ? { success: true } : { success: false, message: 'No bird found' }; }

visual_expectations.description: A blue bird flying/floating in the air, not standing on ground
